an10.199-210:4.1: “Mendicants, you should not associate with a person who has ten qualities.
an10.199-210:4.3: They kill living creatures, steal, and commit sexual misconduct. They use speech that’s lying, divisive, harsh, and meaningless. And they’re covetous, malicious, and have wrong view.
an10.199-210:4.4: You should not associate with a person who has these ten qualities.
an10.199-210:5.1: You should associate with a person who has ten qualities.
an10.199-210:5.3: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct. They don’t use speech that’s lying, divisive, harsh, or meaningless. They’re contented, kind-hearted, and have right view.
an10.199-210:5.4: You should associate with a person who has these ten qualities.”
an10.199-210:6.1: “Mendicants, you should not frequent a person who has ten qualities.
an10.199-210:7.1: A person who has these ten qualities makes much bad karma. …
an10.199-210:7.4: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct. They don’t use speech that’s lying, divisive, harsh, or meaningless. They’re contented, kind-hearted, and have right view.
an10.199-210:7.5: A person who has these ten qualities makes much merit.”
